body:
Files: src/compiler/wasm-call-descriptors.{h,cc}
- class v8::internal::compiler::WasmCallDescriptors [header]
  - WasmCallDescriptors(AccountingAllocator* allocator)
  - CallDescriptor* GetBigIntToI64Descriptor(bool needs_frame_state)
  - CallDescriptor* GetLoweredCallDescriptor(const CallDescriptor* original) [32-bit only]
- Implementation [cc]
  - Initializes descriptors via compiler::GetBuiltinCallDescriptor for Builtin::kBigIntToI64 and Builtin::kBigIntToI32Pair (32-bit) with StubCallMode::kCallBuiltinPointer; also with_frame_state variants.
  - GetLoweredCallDescriptor maps BigIntToI64 to BigIntToI32Pair on 32-bit.
Usage cross refs:
- wasm/wrappers.cc: WasmWrapperTSGraphBuilder::GetBigIntToI64CallDescriptor() calls GetWasmEngine()->call_descriptors()->GetBigIntToI64Descriptor(...)
- compiler/wasm-compiler.cc: WasmWrapperGraphBuilder::GetBigIntToI64CallDescriptor(...) similar.
Related Linkage helpers:
- Linkage::GetJSCallDescriptor, Linkage::GetStubCallDescriptor, Linkage::GetSimplifiedCDescriptor used throughout wrappers to form TSCallDescriptor / TF Call nodes, and for JS trampolines.
explanation: Captures the call-descriptor definitions used by JS↔Wasm wrappers, particularly BigInt<i64> conversion paths and their 32-bit lowering; and notes common Linkage entry points used to construct call descriptors for builtins and JS calls.
